summary: An exterior home (without loading screens) with a small lake near Treva\'s Watch. Has two floors, crafting area, display cases, 100% working libraries, weapon racks, etc...
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15620-1-1335020807.jpg[/img][/center]

First of all... sorry for my bad english :S

Description:
-Treva\'s Retreat is a completely hand crafted exterior home (don\'t use any load screen to enter the house) in the middle of the Rift. It is located north-east of Treva\'s Watch, lore friendly and suitable for any kind of player, though it\'s perfect for a ranger type of character. The house contains everything you need:

- Smithing Area (anvil, grindstone, workbench)
- Tanning Rack
- Alchemy table
- Enchanting Table
- Mannequin
- Weapon Racks
- Weapon and Shield Plaques
- Bookshelves
- Safe storage
- Cooking Pot
- Chopping Block
- Display Cases

-All containers within the house are safe, so you can put your stuff there without any concerns (even in the cupboards, end tables, etc) . 

- With V2.0, I added a follower named Bulfrek who lives in this house. He also provides training in archery (Master)
[center][IMG]http://i1064.photobucket.com/albums/u369/alb084/BulfrekNexus.jpg[/IMG][/center]

-If you wish to move your spouse in this house you will need to download the mod \"Spouses can live anywhere\" by Emma & Amgepo:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11370

Location:
[center][IMG]http://i1064.photobucket.com/albums/u369/alb084/Location-1.jpg[/IMG][/center]

Installation:
-Just drop the files in the Data Folder

Compatibility:
-It is not compatible with any mod that changes this cell, so if you have any mod that modifies the nearby area of Treva\'s Watch, make a backup of your savegame and test it before playing a \"serious game\".

If you liked this mod ENDORSE IT!!!
author: alb084
